name: MSR Alpine Utensil Set
description: A complete quiver of utensils that enables you to flip, stir, strain, and grate. The strainer doubles as a grater, the spoon is marked with common measurement, the spatula has a serrated edge, and they fold for transport.Made of nylon. The grater is glass reinforced to keep the edges sharp.Durable hinge folds repeatedly for travel.Easy to fold and unfold while wearing gloves.
